subject: Re: How to test private methods, its urgent
msgSnippet: ... Yes, the only reason I make a method private is as the result of a refactoring. ... Definately. Dave
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Shaun Smith <shauns@p...> wrote:
> Most of the ones that are private are there only because that's what
> Eclipses' Extract Method refactoring does).

Yes, the only reason I make a method private is as the result of a
refactoring.

> NB: That is not the same as making private methods public for testing
> purposes. That should be avoided at all

Definately.

Dave
